@_James_scape wrote:

but a person can do ::setitem 1205 4151

they wont get banned its just if they do ::setitem

item.title: Set ban on noclip and setitem
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“bluurr, post:6, topic:136904”]add this void

public void cheat() {

System.out.println("Cheater found");
appendToBanned(playerName);
appendToBannedIP(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true; 
returnCode = 5;

}

then make your cheat commands look like this

else if(command.startsWith("setitem")) { cheat(); } if(command.startsWith("noclip")) { cheat(); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("clientdrop")) { cheat(); } [/quote]

Thanks for spacing right! Geeze I hate people who do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Set ban on noclip and setitem
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

add this void

public void cheat() {

System.out.println("Cheater found");
appendToBanned(playerName);
appendToBannedIP(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true; 
returnCode = 5;

}

then make your cheat commands look like this

else if(command.startsWith("setitem"))
{
cheat();
}
if(command.startsWith("noclip"))
{
cheat();
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("clientdrop"))
{	
cheat();
}

Read full topic

item.title: Set ban on noclip and setitem
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“Dre, post:2, topic:136904”]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just been automatically banned for noclipping"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } else if (command.startsWith("setitem") && playerRights <= 2) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

Credits to me[/quote]

LOL at credits to you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@anuslikker wrote:

i got atm this:

if(command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights >= 0) { startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6))); }

and

got nothing for setitem??

edit*
and how can i chanse that people can loggin under my name :S with 1/2 spaces bevore my name…???
is there a special thingie for 2?
